name: Javanese Naga
shortLoreBlurb: Javanese Naga is a spirit from Java/Indonesia associated with serpents, sea. Stories warn that respect for waters and their spirits is essential. Serpentine power signals both wisdom and danger at liminal borders.
overlapsLinks: Fafnir (Norse), Jörmungandr (Norse), Manannán mac Lir (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Quetzalcoatl (Aztec), Tangaroa (Polynesian), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Javanese Naga is a spirit from Java/Indonesia associated with serpents, sea. Stories warn that respect for waters and their spirits is essential. Serpentine power signals both wisdom and danger at liminal borders.
